name: Construct: Embers of Life
description: With no memory of who you are, you must discover the secrets of your past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 64 Processor: Core i5-2400 3.1GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5012 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 64 Processor: Core i7-3770 4-Core 3.4GH Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5012 MB available space
